dialogue.line: lil bro went silent after my beat dropped, fucking loser
can you like get me out of here please
shut the fuck up you big fat fuck bastard idiot
eat more than tofu and salad, those shit don't work no-more thanks to your fucking weight.
Hey buddy, watch it, i got 54 followers on my Twitter account, you're gonna get cancelled.
did you run out of things to say
actually yeah i dont have any more ideas for the dialogue
man fuck you now this demo will have #OUTDATED memes in 2 years
big chungus, you kinda look like
